scripts.doc: turbo doc && cp index.html docs/index.html && mv docs/ic_vetkd_notes_client/sitemap.xml docs/ic_vetkd_notes_client/.nojekyll docs/ && rm -rf docs/.lock
scripts.watch: cargo watch --why --ignore packages/wasm-client/tsup.config.bundled* --ignore packages/wasm-client/pkg --ignore packages/wasm-client/dist -x 'build' -s 'cd packages/wasm-client && wasm-pack build && mv pkg/wasm_client.js pkg/wasm_client.mjs && pnpm tsup'
